amendment.description: An amendment numbered 21 printed in House Report 118-12 to require that the local educational agency discloses to parents any videos or recordings of violent activity of which they are aware.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (NJ) amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Smith (NJ).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (NJ) amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
